game.name: Trapped Dead
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: You and up to three friends fight to survive the Zombie outbreak in this game inspired by early '80s horror films!
game.shortDescriptionEn: You and up to three friends fight to survive the Zombie outbreak in this game inspired by early '80s horror films!

reviewHighlights.text: Personally I ended up being pretty disappointed with this. The story and gameplay just aren't that great.
Gameplay isnt bad, control need sometime to get used to but still playable. But I cant recommend this game because of few bugs. And there was one time...
